project_path.Ragnarok: contracts/Ragnarok Full Smart Contract Security Audit/Ragnarok

findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: Functions `includeInReward()` and `_getCurrentSupply` may be aborted with OUT_OF_GAS exception if there are long excluded addresses lists.
findings.location: Functions `includeInReward()` and `_getCurrentSupply` in the Ragnarok contract
